timeline.message: refactor: Initial set of changes to add java code to web project.
test: Clean up the test for audit entry.
refactor: Move web actions and controller into components packages.
refactor: Move test classes into other packages.
refactor: Create component project and get tests working.
test: Move a test into the component project.
test: Clean up Assert and Assertions imports.

timeline.bodyText: Could we make this an api dependency of channel instead of duplicating it here?
timeline.author: gkillough
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,24 @@
+ext.moduleName = 'com.synopsys.integration.alert.component'
+
+repositories {
+    // Need this repository to resolve the spring-security-saml2-core dependencies
+    maven {
+        url 'https://build.shibboleth.net/nexus/content/repositories/releases/'
+    }
+}
+
+dependencies {
+    implementation project(':alert-common')
+    implementation project(':alert-database')
+    implementation project(':channel')
+    implementation project(":workflow")
+
+    implementation 'com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat:jackson-dataformat-xml'

replies.bodyText: Went through all of the build.gradle files and updated the configurations for all the libraries.
replies.author: psantos1113

timeline.bodyText: These may be better created in a beforeEach method? Looks like the majority of these classes are used in most tests
timeline.author: bamandel

replies.bodyText: Encapsulated the initialization of the fields.

timeline.bodyText: Would we be able to remove some of the dependencies we copied over to the web and component sub-projects?

@@ -87,9 +87,12 @@ dependencies {
     implementation project(':alert-common')
     implementation project(':alert-database')
     implementation project(':channel')

replies.bodyText: Went through all of the build.gradle files and updated the configurations for all the libraries.

timeline.bodyText: Should some of these be api dependencies that web could use?
timeline.author: gkillough
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,24 @@
+ext.moduleName = 'com.synopsys.integration.alert.component'
+
+repositories {
+    // Need this repository to resolve the spring-security-saml2-core dependencies
+    maven {
+        url 'https://build.shibboleth.net/nexus/content/repositories/releases/'
+    }
+}
+
+dependencies {
+    implementation project(':alert-common')
+    implementation project(':alert-database')
+    implementation project(':channel')
+    implementation project(":workflow")
+
+    implementation 'com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat:jackson-dataformat-xml'
+
+    implementation 'org.springframework.security:spring-security-core'
+    implementation 'org.springframework.security:spring-security-config'
+    implementation 'org.springframework.security:spring-security-ldap'
+    implementation 'org.springframework.security:spring-security-web'
+
+    implementation 'org.springframework.security.extensions:spring-security-saml2-core:1.0.10.RELEASE'

replies.bodyText: Went through all of the build.gradle files and updated the configurations for all the libraries.
replies.author: psantos1113
